ygData.subject: How can this list be improved?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, As some of you may recall, I m the moderator of this mailing list.  I created it because I noticed that Everquest was a boy-dominated game and I
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,

As some of you may recall, I'm the moderator of this mailing list. I
created it because I noticed that Everquest was a boy-dominated game and I
thought it would be cool to create a list for women who play Everquest to
chat with eachother.

But, this list is pretty quiet, though we do have 75 members. So, my
question is, how can this list better serve the needs of its members?

I would like to hear everyone's ideas. What would you like to see on this
list? How can this list better serve your needs?

Tina (Brell Serilis)
